name: risk_weight
question: How risk affine are you?
use_case: Consider the following situation: A lottery ticket kiosk at a funfair offers 5 types of € 1 tickets, with varying rewards and chances to win. Which type of ticket would you choose?

options.label: 100% chance of winning a prize of € 1
80% chance of winning a prize of € 1.25
50% chance of winning a prize of € 2
10% chance of winning a prize of € 10
1% chance of winning a prize of € 100

name: esg_weight
question: How sustainability affine are you?
use_case: Assume an forward auction (like on ebay) to buy a portfolio with a better ESG rating. Only the bidder with the highest bid will win. Your overall portfolio budget is € 10.000. By how much would you decrease your investment to bid at the auction?

options.label: By € 1 for additional 0,01% ESG value points
By € 10 for additional 0,1% ESG value points
By € 100 for additional 1% ESG value points
By € 1000 for additional 10% ESG value points
